task.summary: Imported the SMS Library using JitPack Added Project structure
Fixed library usage, application was previously using the specific class, now using common interface CommunicationHandler through SMSManager.
Completed the Localization feature Added Interface Command<M> Fixed getLastLocation, now working properly with an object parameter that implements Command<M>, so that executes the given command
Improved modularity of methods to request permissions
Fixed problems with dependency to sms Library
Changed Interface (from Dev_Pardeep code) Added request sms forwarding
Added Peer Location request Prepared for adding Peer audio Alarm request Changed Library usage, back to SmsHandler

Bug fix in Sms receiving method, now able to extract correctly gps coordinates from response message and to open maps application Added unit test UI upgrade, now possible to request Location and audio Alarm singularly and simultaneously

Added background Broadcast Receiver, answers requests when app is closed (some redundant code). New activity added: AlarmAndLocateActivity, all alarm and location requests are forwarded to it. OnReceive method of MainActivity now manages just the responses. New class Constants added to avoid hardwiring.

MESSAGE.value: Imported the SMS Library using JitPack Added Project structure
Fixed library usage, application was previously using the specific class, now using common interface CommunicationHandler through SMSManager.
Completed the Localization feature Added Interface Command<M> Fixed getLastLocation, now working properly with an object parameter that implements Command<M>, so that executes the given command
Improved modularity of methods to request permissions
Fixed problems with dependency to sms Library
Changed Interface (from Dev_Pardeep code) Added request sms forwarding
Added Peer Location request Prepared for adding Peer audio Alarm request Changed Library usage, back to SmsHandler

Bug fix in Sms receiving method, now able to extract correctly gps coordinates from response message and to open maps application Added unit test UI upgrade, now possible to request Location and audio Alarm singularly and simultaneously

Added background Broadcast Receiver, answers requests when app is closed (some redundant code). New activity added: AlarmAndLocateActivity, all alarm and location requests are forwarded to it. OnReceive method of MainActivity now manages just the responses. New class Constants added to avoid hardwiring.
